resources.string:
To play, click on any of the boxes to reveal it. 
 If the square does not have any batteries around it, they will reveal the squares until they reach one that does.
 The squares that have pine cones nearby show a number that indicates how many pine cones there are.
 To mark a pineapple, press and hold the box to mark it.
 The game ends when all the pineapples are spilled or a pineapple is punctured.
